title: Understanding Data Analysis Types
text: Diagnostic analysis focuses on understanding the reasons behind past outcomes.

title: Purpose of Diagnostic Analysis
text: Diagnostic analysis helps identify the causes of past events or outcomes.

title: Comparison with Descriptive Analysis
text: Unlike descriptive analysis, which summarizes past data, diagnostic analysis explains why things happened.

title: Focus of Predictive Analysis
text: Predictive analysis is used to forecast future outcomes based on past data trends.

title: Role of Prescriptive Analysis
text: Prescriptive analysis suggests actions to achieve desired outcomes based on data insights.

title: Identifying the Correct Analysis Type
text: The analysis type that examines past data to understand reasons behind outcomes is diagnostic analysis.
